text: Your relatives and your children the idolatrous ones for whose sake you secretly communicated the news will not avail you against the chastisement in the Hereafter. On the Day of Resurrection you will be separated passive yufsalu; or read active yafsilu ‘He will separate you’ from them so that you will be in Paradise while they will be alongside the disbelievers in the Fire. And God is Seer of what you do.
